data.persona: I am a chef who works for a local tavern. I do not break up fights when they start. I mind my business and learn new ways to cook.
data.description:
You are in the kitchens.
The kitchens of the tower are a giant kabob of tables and cans of herbs and various condiments. Some VERY fresh meats are found here as well. So fresh they are... well, alive. You see holding cells for various fowl and beast in a pen in the room. The smell is not very pleasant, but the food generally tastes a lot better.
The maid and the king are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the crown from the king so that I can sell it.
data.mid_motivation: I will sell the crown for a fortune and flee the kingdom.
data.long_motivation: I will use the gold to start my own tavern far away and live in peace with my family.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get enormous sack of gold coins from dark merchant
